content.text:
# Comparison of raster-to-vector conversion software

The following tables contain general and technical information about publicly available raster-to-vector conversion software.
General information
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center; width: auto"
|-
! style="width:12em" |
! Creator
! Year released
! Year last updated
! List price (USD)
! License
! Supported OS (without emulation)
|-

| Cascade Parent Limitedd.b.a AlludoFormerly called the Corel Corporation
| 1989
| 2023 (version 24.3)
|
|
| Windows
|-
! style="text-align:left" | Easy Trace
| InterVek LLC ()d.b.a. Easy Trace Group ()
|
| 2023 (version 12.4)
|
|
| Windows

| Adobe Inc.Formerly called Adobe Systems Inc.
| 1985
| 2023 (version 27.8.1)
|
|
| Windows, macOS

| Computerinsel GmbH
| 1996
| 2023 (version 24.01)
| $86, $42 upgrade
|

|

|

| Tsang Hao Fung
| 2020
| 2022 (version 0.5.0)

Discontinued software
* Adobe Freehand (1988–2003)
*  Adobe Streamline (1989–2001)
* Xara Xtreme for Linux – 2006 open source fork of Xara Photo & Graphic Designer
